QuestData.Title: A Gulper Ate The Rolly
QuestData.Description:
The Bubble-eyed Rolly used to be plentiful in the nearby pond. Last week they all started to vanish!
A large water elemental has been swallowing all the fish! They are still alive, just swimming around inside the elemental now.
I need you to kill that elemental, and catch three Bubbly-eyed Rolly so I can examine their condition.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Rolly Gulper and catch $2oa Bubble-eyed Rolly.
